    GET_GIFT_CERTIFICATE_TAGS_BY_TAG_NAME
    "SELECT gc.id , gc.name , gc.description, gc.price, gc.duration ,gc.create_date ,gc.last_update_date FROM gift_certificate_tag gct JOIN tag t JOIN gift_certificate gc WHERE gc.id = gct.gift_certificate_id AND t.id = gct.tag_id AND t.name = ?"
